speaker: Alice
content: I was laid to rest on a Monday.
mark: lay 安放，放置；铺放，铺设；下（蛋），产（卵） -> laid -> laid
lay to rest 安葬，埋葬; 结束，解决; 使平静，使安心

speaker: Alice
content: After the funeral, all the residents of Wisteria Lane came to pay their respects.
mark: funeral 葬礼，丧礼
resident n.居民 adj. 居住的，居留的 residence n. 住宅，住所
Wisteria Lane 紫藤巷   wisteria 紫藤   lane 小路
pay one's respects 表示敬意

speaker: Alice
content: And, as people do in these situations, they brought food.
mark: as people do 在强调行为的普遍性和习惯性时，“as people do” 更为合适；而在强调模仿或效仿他人行为时，“like people do” 更为贴切。

speaker: Alice
content: Lynette Scavo brought fried chicken.
mark: fried chicken 炸鸡

speaker: Alice
content: Lynette had a great family recipe for fried chicken.
mark: recipe 烹饪法，食谱；诀窍，秘诀；原因；

speaker: Alice
content: Of course, she didn't cook much while she was moving up the corporate ladder. She didn't have the time.
mark: move up the corporate ladder 向上爬梯子：指在公司或组织中逐步晋升到更高的职位或地位。
corporate 公司的；法人的；共同的，全体的
ladder 梯子；（职位晋升的）阶梯
while 强调两个动作同时进行，而 when 强调两个动作的先后顺序。

speaker: Alice
content: But when her doctor announced Lynette was pregnant, her husband Tom had an idea.
mark: pregnant adj. 怀孕的，妊娠的

speaker: Alice
content: Why not quit your job? Kids do better with stay-at-home moms. So it would be so much less stressful.
mark: Why not...? 口语省略句=Why don't you...?

speaker: Alice
content: But this was not the case.
mark: not the case. 不是这样的

speaker: Alice
content: In fact, Lynette's life had become so hectic, she was now forced to get her fried chicken from the fast-food restaurant.
mark: hectic 繁忙的，忙乱的；
be forced to 被迫

speaker: Alice
content: Lynette would've appreciated the irony if she'd stopped to think about it.
mark: appreciate 欣赏，鉴赏；理解，明白；感谢，感激；升值，增值
irony （出乎意料的）奇异可笑之处，具有讽刺意味的情况；反语，讽刺
Lynette would've appreciated the irony if she'd stopped to think about it. 如果勒奈特当时停下来思考一下，她就会体会到其中的讽刺意味了
would have done + if 从句 had done 结构，描述与过去事实相反的假设

speaker: Alice
content: But she couldn't. she didn't have the time.

speaker: Lynette
content: No, you are going to behave today. I am not going to be humiliated in front of the entire neighborhood. And, just so you know how serious I am...
mark: behave 行为，表现；起反应，起作用；守规矩，举止得体
humiliate 羞辱，使蒙羞
entire 全部的，整个的；完全的，绝对的
serious 严重的，危急的；认真的，严肃的；重要的，须重视的
just so you know 只是让你知道

speaker: Boy
content: What's that?

speaker: Lynette
content: Santa's cell-phone number.

speaker: Boy
content: How did you get that?

speaker: Lynette
content: I know someone who knows someone who knows an elf.
mark: elf （神话故事中的）小精灵，小妖精

speaker: Lynette
content: And if any of you acts up, so help me, I will call Santa. I will tell him you want socks for Christmas.
mark: act up 行为不端，调皮捣蛋；功能失常，出毛病；恶化，加重
so help me 发誓，诚心诚意

speaker: Lynette
content: Are you willing to risk that?

speaker: Lynette
content: OK, let's get this over with.
mark: Let's get this over with 让我们赶快结束这一切吧
get it over with 尽快完成某事，特别是为了让不愉快的事情尽快过去
